answers.author: Lynn Yandell
answers.text:
We do this at FPL. We started with 5 laptops circing for in-house use only and 5 for "take home" checkout for two weeks at a time (same default circ interval for books). This 5 unit deployment was a test case to see if it was viable, would they be stolen, would they get broken, would it be popular.
We have had zero theft and only minor repairs needed (mostly to split power cables). We increased the number of units to 25 for take home checkout. There are over 50 holds on them now.
